name: Word Count Histogram
body: # word_count_histogram ### A simple, visual, terminal-based word count histogram in idiomatic Python Takes a string of words as input and returns a word frequency histogram and total. ## Example [watson@watson-thinkpad word_count_histogram (master)]$ python word_count_histogram.py Enter text:ardvark bird bird cow cow cow dog dog dog dog ardvark 1 * bird 2 ** cow 3 *** dog 4 **** TOTAL 10 words David Watson
tagline: A simple visual word count histogram in ten lines of python code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
